text: Xu Shousheng (; 23 January 1953 â€“ 5 December 2020) was a Chinese politician. He was the Communist Party Secretary of Hunan from 2013 to 2016. He was the Governor of Hunan and Gansu provinces from 2006 to 2013. Xu was born in Jiangsu, China. Xu died on 5 December 2020 in Nanjing, China at the age of 67. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Jiangsu
title: Xu Shousheng
